name: Skate Me
description:
"Skate me!" game is not that attractive if you are wondering how it is to practice them in reality, but if you choose to play on device then it is completely different. You won’t play a team sport, you won’t play a ball sport and you won’t play a mind game… but you will play Skate me! game & this game is the best if you like having active fun while you play.

You will be playing as an individual and No wonder that this game is also considered extreme ones…. The players will actually reach incredible speed while you increase the speed of player through speedometer.
# Features---------
* Beautiful three locations with different sound.
* Collect bonus coins while skating using left bottom key for jumping.
* Avoid ice cubes, nails, cactus, ice hills which will come on the way.
* By left side slider you can adjust your speed of skating.
* Your score is based on the distance travelled and bonus collected and time.
* Make new high scores and save in Game Centre.
* Easy to share your score on Facebook & Twitter.
